name: Ragdoll Man - Gem rescue
description:
Ragdoll Man Gem Rescue

In this brand new highly frustrating game drop your ragdoll down the caves to rescue the gems that were lost on a recent mining expedition.

All caves are possible

How to play

Hold either left or right of the screen to move the ragdoll out the way of the wall and rocks within the cave

Don't touch the rocks!

More caves coming soon
